内容简介

[

In China today,charity programs are approaching peoples daily life.In addition，more and more charity organizations are emerging and they are growing mature.The policies and measures adopted by the Chinese government to facilitate charity services are increasingly improved.All these enhance our confidence that charity programs will better the life of the Chinese people in the 21st century.

]
